channel.title: Apache, IoT, mynewt on David G. Simmons
channel.description: Recent content in Apache, IoT, mynewt on David G. Simmons

item.title: Building an App with Apache MyNewt
item.description: I’ve been spending a lot of time over the last few months working on the Apache MyNewt IoT OS. If you don’t know what that is, then you really should! It’s a fairly new Apache Project, still in the ‘incubating’ phase, but they’re about to release their second beta of the 1.0 release (I think all the votes are in to approve it). Yes, there are some things still missing, and some rough edges, but it’s coming together nicely and if you’re looking for an Open Source IoT OS for your device, MyNewt may just what you’re looking for.
